emodnet.wfs: Access EMODnet Web Feature Service data through R

Source: R/emodnet.wfs-package.R
emodnet.wfs-package.Rd

Access and interrogate EMODnet (European Marine Observation and Data Network) Web Feature Service data through R.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://emodnet.github.io/emodnet.wfs/

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/EMODnet/emodnet.wfs/issues
